phrases: Pre!
Preparation!
I am not strong
But pre!
Pre-parade!
I will catch you someday!
P-re-prepare, p-re-prepare, p-re-prepare, cracking apart
P-re-prepare, p-re-prepare, p-re-prepare
If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
How does it feel?
It feels like that
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
ba ni ra
With vanilla salt
vanilla
If it is just sweet
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
It is too frustrating
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I cannot be honest
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Like putting salt
Into sweet vanilla...
One Step Forward
Magical Contract
Magical Contract
Aisaka Taiga's Plan
Aisaka Taiga's Plan
for School Domination
for School Domination
Text: Write an apology letter
Idiot.
Next Episode Preview
Mercury Retrogrades at Christmas
I will announce it right now.
When I, Aisaka Taiga, am elected as student council president,
I will make this school mine and bury your high school life, along with your bloody memories,
in a m-morgue!
The Palmtop Tiger is going to become student council president?!
You are kidding me!
Cut it out already!
I am her campaign manager.
If you have any problems, I will deal with them!
It is Kitamura.
He said he is quitting the student council and will not participate in the election.
So that is why the Palmtop Tiger is running for it.
If any of you try to get in my way, I will not show you any mercy!
No way!
If the Palmtop Tiger becomes student council president, our school life will be ruined!
Someone help!
Is not there a brave soul who will help us?!
Oh, right!
If Kitamura runs for it...
Exactly.
Why is not he running?
We are begging you, help us!
At this rate, our high school life will really be ruined!
Hey, what the heck are you guys do -
A plan to get Kitamura back?
Yes.
Since everyone will be troubled by Taiga,
there is no choice for him other than to run.
In other words, you think that if Kitamura-kun gets elected,
he will revert back to his old self?
We are not the only ones who think that.
I talked to everyone in the class on the phone last night.
They said they will help out.
So that is what that drama was about.
What will happen if Kitamura-kun just refuses?
If no one else enters by this Friday,
Aisaka-san will truly become the student council president.
Kitamura-kun is definitely not the type of person to sit back and watch.
All right.
Come to the office later.
I will teach you how to use the printer.
You need to make posters and flyers, right?
Geez, Kitamura sure is a stubborn guy.
I really thought it would work, after all that effort.
There is only one day left.
Cannot we come up with another plan?
I do not know.
I have no idea what is going on.
Hello?
Um, is this Takasu-kun?
Yes.
I am sorry.
I have never talked to you before.
I am Murase from the student council.
You are from the student council?
Oh, I see.
Thank you for telling me.
Ryuuji, who was that?
Ryuuji, where are you going?!
I am going to beat the shit out of Kitamura!
Wai -
Kanou, the current president, will be leaving next week to study abroad.
It is probably because of the president that Kitamura is...
That dumbass!
Takasu?
I am sorry I did not tell you guys about it.
You hold back too much, Kitamura.
I did not tell anyone because I thought it was pretty lame.
I mean, I am in love with the president.
I heard that Kanou-senpai is leaving for America next week.
Yeah, she wants to be an astronaut.
A professor at an astronautics academy there personally accepted her.
That is incredible.
I had not heard anything about this before.
Actually, I was planning to confess once I became student council president.
I figured she would respect me by then.
However, by the time I become student council president, she will be gone.
I asked myself if there were any other reasons to get elected,
and after thinking about it, I got scared and decided to give up.
So that is why you dyed your hair.
My dad finally exploded today.
As you can see, he punished me.
I am such a fool.
Even if I could win her over,
it is not like she would give up her chance to study overseas.
Wishes do not always come true.
What makes you say that?
Nothing really.
I just thought of a similar conversation I had with Taiga.
Someone told her that things are not progressing well for her.
In the end, Taiga got mad and beat the person up.
Oh, as expected of Aisaka.
She is on a completely different level.
Perhaps I would feel better if Aisaka beat me up.
What?
Ryuuji!
Hey, you stupid dog!
Taiga.
I know what is going on.
I know Aisaka became a candidate for my sake.
I know everyone is worrying about me.
I know I cannot stay like this forever.
I am going home.
Thanks for listening to me.
Kitamura!
Do not worry.
I have made the decision myself.
I will see you at school tomorrow.
I finally found you, Ryuuji!
What were you doing here?
Do not tell me you really...
I did not.
Then, what was that call about?
I do not want to tell you.
Come on, guys!
Tomorrow is election day!
I will chase everyone who does not vote for me into the depths of hell!
Listen, this school will be...
T-Taiga.
Kitamura.
Kitamura-kun.
I am sorry for before, guys.
I am okay now.
No!
I will never allow something like this to happen!
I, Kitamura Yuusaku, will definitely steer this school onto the correct path!
Kitamura-kun.
So you have made your decision,
Kitamura.
Huh?
Are you sure there has not been a mistake?
It is true.
Kitamura-kun still has not turned in his candidate form.
According to the rules, he cannot run if it is not turned in by four.
Sorry, but I have to go!
Wait, Takasu-kun!
What is up, Takasu?
Aisaka and the others are already gone.
I think they are going to that new cafe in front of the station.
Four of the clock is the deadline for turning in your application.
What are you going to do?
At this rate, you will...
Let us go home, Takasu.
Are you serious?
There is no more time to think -
I have already thought about it.
I think I will give up after all.
It is all right, really.
Kitamura.
We have not walked home together in quite a while.
I think the last time was when we were freshmen.
It is because you are so busy with the student council.
Oh right, I do not think I told you why I joined the student council.
Huh?
Yeah.
I was really enthusiastic when I started at this school.
I think it is what they call a high school debut.
The first step towards a fun high school life is finding a girlfriend,
do not you think?
I heard that there was this really beautiful girl in another class.
So I decided to confess to her.
Oh, you already know this part.
When I was feeling really down after Aisaka rejected me,
I met that person...
I saw everything, freshman.
Do not worry.
Your high school life has only just begun!
Come join the student council!
She said I would feel better after doing some hard work there.
Just like that, I was brought to the student council room.
Since then, every day has been fun,
and I even became good friends with Aisaka.
My wish to have a fun high school life came true.
That uncertain first step I took after hearing her words led me here.
And yet,
I cannot take the next step.
So you are going to run away?
What about the underclassmen who want you to become student council president?
Are you going to abandon them?
Do not tell me you are a man who would do that!
You have lifted your foot already, right?
You lifted it because you wanted to move forward, right?
So what other choice do you have,
but to take a step forward?!
Do not slack off.
I will be watching what sort of student council president you become.
What was that?
Takasu, what time is it now?
A superstar always appears at the last moment, right?
I am sorry, I have something important to do.
Yeah.
Now the candidates running for student council president will give their speeches.
Because the other candidate forfeited,
the only candidate is Kitamura Yuusaku-san from Class 2-C.
As you have heard, I am Kitamura Yuusaku.
I am...
No...
President, I...
I am standing here today because I fell in love with you!
I want to confirm your feelings before you leave!
Do I really have no hope at all?
Are we not bonded by a special fate?!
Please answer me!
Was not that a confession?
Kanou, answer him!
Yeah!
You should give him an answer!
Go, Kanou-san!
So?
Just as you see,
that is the vice-president, Kitamura Yuusaku, you know.
He is interesting, right?
If someone as interesting as him becomes the president,
this school will definitely become interesting too.
Everyone, please give your precious vote to that interesting guy over there!
Kanou-senpai!
Why did not you answer him properly?
Did not you tell Kitamura to move forward yesterday?
Yet, why?
I told him to become a candidate.
I did not tell him to confess.
Are you running away?!
Walking forward like an idiot is what they call clumsy.
Kitamura needs to learn how to live his life wisely.
You really are a good friend.
Stay good friends with Kitamura.
Wai - I am not finished yet!
Taiga?
Kitamura-kun is crying.
Please Ryuuji, stay by his side.
I am no help.
I cannot stay and comfort him.
What about you?
I am all right.
I am really all right.
So please go back to Kitamura-kun's side.
But...
Go!
The thing you wish for the most is something you will never get.
When I came to understand that, I did not know what to do.
At that time, Kitamura-kun smiled and held my hand.
He is such a kind person.
I cannot show him how grateful I am with a simple thank you.
I understand the one he likes is not me;
however,
I want to do what I can for him.
Just like he did for me.
Kanou...
What is going on?
It is the Palmtop Tiger?
Why is she here?
Am I doing something wrong?
Fight me!
So there is still an idiot left.
Fine, I will fight you.
I am not in a good mood, anyway.
Kendo club guys, lend me a sword.
I do not understand who is wrong and who is not.
Sure.
All I know is,
I cannot stop moving forward!
Takasu, are you here?
Hurry up!
The Palmtop Tiger is...
You dumbasses!
Shut the hell up!
You are a coward!
You are just afraid that you will hurt others or get hurt yourself.
Because of your cowardice and foulness,
you hurt Kitamura-kun!
Unforgivable!
I will never forgive you!
Cut it out, Taiga!
Let go!
Oh my god, what is going on?
Taiga!
You are just cowardly and foul!
You are just a weakling who cannot face her own feelings!
So what if I am a weakling?!
You are just a violent bitch!
That is nothing compared to you!
Show me!
If you cannot accept Kitamura-kun's feelings,
then say you hate him!
Say it!
What do you understand about me?!
If I could become an idiot like you, I would!
I also want to be an idiot who only knows how to dash forward!
If I say I like him, he will follow me, right?!
If he knew I wanted him to follow me, he would do it, right?!
He is the type of person who would sacrifice anything for it!
That is why...
That is why I cannot be an idiot!
You are a really kind person.
I loved you from the bottom of my heart.
I am glad that I fell in love with you.
Thank you very much!
After that, before the teachers came to control the situation,
we could not do anything.
I am really sorry for causing you so much trouble.
What is wrong?
I found a student ID while cleaning up just then.
It seems like it belongs to Taiga.
Then, give it to Takasu-kun.
Wait, he is busy with the teachers.
She really does love him.
Underneath -
I will return this to her.
Let us go back to the classroom.
Are your feelings of guilt gone?
Kanou-senpai spent her last day at school bruised.
Two days later, she left for America.
Kitamura received the honor of being Number One Pitiful Guy,
and he became the student council president.
Also, Taiga was suspended for two weeks.
Christmas.
Angel Taiga will help you with your love life!
She will even take off her clothes for you!
No, it will be troublesome if you catch a cold.
Put your clothes back on.
